name: Guardians.io
description:
Guardians.io

A PVP treasure-hunting game!

Story

You are a member of a colonist group. One day, you explore a mysterious temple far away home. In the temple are full of jewelry. However, strong GUARDIANs are in the way. On top of that, there happened to be another group of colonists! Oh no!

Objective

Your mission is to get as many treasures as possible in a fixed length of time. 

Gems will be dropped when defeating a GUARDIAN. They are every room in the map. However, they are not a piece of cake...Be careful not to be killed!!

The wealthier team in the end will win the game.

Game link

https://www.modd.io/play/pvptreasure
